title: The Volanis Brothers Trilogy
description: Three bad boy novels, over 50% off for a limited time.  Praise for Meg Jackson's bestselling Volanis Brothers series:  "This was a new author for me but I must say I was impressed! I liked the style of writing. I've never read a book with Gypsies. I really like how she brought in romance, intrigue, odd small town life and strong family together... I definitely recommend this book!! Enjoy!! I know I did!! " ★★★★★ - Jen  "I loved Kennick- so I was excited to read Cristov- Meg Jackson DID NOT disappoint! I can't wait to see what happens in the next installment of this series!" ★★★★★ - EJMLC  "I absolutely love this series. Damon, to me, is the sexiest brother of the three. He has a past that has haunted him for a very long time." ★★★★★  - Tasha  Adults only.
author: Meg Jackson
